message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you first at a price of $14,000. I believe it offers significant value and would be a worthwhile investment for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $12,000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, I'm willing to come down to $13,000.  I believe this is a fair price that reflects the true value of the product.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit higher than $13,000. Would you be willing to meet me at $11,500?
